title: Huge renovated 3bdr, 2 bath, Inman Sq., laundry in unit, eik,
posting_body: ['SOMERVILLE – INMAN SQUARE –', 'Price:', '$4,600', 'Available:', '9/1/22.', '3 BEDROOM - 2 BATH', 'Huge, renovated 3 bedroom, 2 bath duplex in the heart of Inman Square.', 'Large eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and granite counters.', 'Lovely hardwood floors throughout.', 'Laundry in unit.', 'Storage in the basement.', 'Shared yard.', 'Parking in the driveway for additional money.', 'No pets, no smoking allowed.', 'NO PETS - 1 parking Driveway $300.Listing#-195119008', '**NOTE: Price and availability, subject to change, without notice.', '**', 'Century 21 Avon', '1675 Massachusetts Ave.', 'Cambridge, MA 02138', '617-661-8400', 'E-mail: Click "Reply" button above.']
